name: Falling Up
description:
1-2 player puzzle platformer heavily inspired by Ibb and Obb. 

Single player is available in the settings from the main menu. 

Controls:

Player 1: wasd

Player 2: arrow keys

Created for the spring 2016 Waterloo Game Jam.

Created by: Marieta Farova, Yuki Ji and Ian Holstead

Art by https://kenney.nl/
